metadata.synopsis: A worried Rikka is looking for Doni so that she can lock up a shelter before an imminent attack.

0.speaker: Rikka
0.text: Doni! I don't want to lock you outside, please.
0.context: NodeContext: More quietly than her other shouts, as much to herself.

1.speaker: Rikka
1.text: We don't have time for this, Doni, please!
1.context: NodeContext: End of her tether with this boy - he means well but he disappears and is frustrated

2.speaker: Rikka
2.text: Doni! It's time to come back now! DONI!
2.context: NodeContext: Worried, increasingly exasperated as the child she's looking for doesn't appear
